title: Removal of Primetime Draven's voiceovershaha
body:
So my original post was deleted so I'm posting it here, where Riot suggested I did (instead of addressing my question).

Why would you sell me a skin for 975rp based on its appearance, animations, and voiceovers, just to take those voiceovers back off and leaving it with Draven's original phrases. My biggest issue with this is that you can easily find tons of videos showcasing the hilarious and elaborate lines that skin had (ie: Skin Spotlights videos) and now anyone else who goes to buy the skin will be a victim of false advertising, even if indirect. Since my support ticket has, and will continue to be ignored I'll just ask for my rp to be refunded here.

Thanks.

replies.body:
It is most likely just a bug that they need to fix. 

I own the skin myself and just tested it out in a practice to see and yes, the voice over seems to be missing.

Hi djigglybits,

Sorry for the inconvenience on this! It is indeed a bug. It has already been taken care of and the fix will be patched out with the next patch. Thanks for your patience on this!
thanks for the response. I just needed to know that it was a bug and not just some major change. I really love that skin haha
you have the original vo when using the skin.....you know thats most likely just a bug right?

I don't understand why the sudden people are all going of on some elaborate conspiracy theory instead of comming at the logic conclusion. 

Yes this completely some sort of wild conspiracy to scan innocent people instead of just an unfortunate bug...
Riot thanks you for your continued noble defense of their namesake, m'sir.
